allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add scrape.js: HTML-to-JSON parser for property catalog updates

Usage: node scrape.js <path-to-html>
Parses property articles from scraping HTML and regenerates src/data/properties.json
with title, slug, specs, description, images and originalUrl.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
